summary: This mod changes the male Dovahkiin Nord voice from MaleEvenToned to MaleNord.
descriptionHtml:
Change My Nord Voice by hardermob

This mod is primarily intended to be used with \'Dovahkiin Relaxes Too\' by wgstein; make sure ChangeMyNordVoice.esp is loaded after this other mod.  

This mod does three things:

1) It changes NordRace -> Body Data -> Default voice type from \'MaleEvenToned\' to \'MaleNord\'.  

2) It adds in the missing voice powers sounds for MaleNord, as this voice type is not a default
   player voice type (even though the Nord race itself is playable, MaleEvenToned is the default
   voice type for the Nord race.)

3) It also adds back in many other potentially missing sounds for the Nord voice, most notably
   out of breath running sounds.

Now, instead of hearing your burly Nord warrior asking your wife \", What do you need?\" in a soprano-like elven-sounding voice, you\'ll hear him more often than not simply grunt like a true Nord!

--------------------------------
Change log:

v1.1: Fixed so that shouts are no longer silent after the change to NordMale
v1.3: Added many other missing sounds for Nord voice, including out of stamina breathing
v2.0: Dawnguard and Dragonborn shouts added
v2.1: Mounted combat fixed (I\'ve removed all versions prior to 2.1 because mounted melee combat did not work correctly) 

Note: If you do not have Dawnguard and/or Dragonborn DLC, 2.1 should still work fine for you.
author: hardermob
